pages.text: The $(item)Rune of Self Sacrifice$() increases the amount of $(blood)Life Essence$() gained in the Blood Altar through means that use a player's health. Each rune gives a bonus of +10% additively per rune.

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:neovitae:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Rune of Self Sacrifice$(), increasing bonus to an additive +20% per rune.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
